name: Project: Hard Boiled
description:
Welcome new Recruit In this quick fire game, you are sent into a training exercise; Project: Hard Boiled.

Maneuverer your way around the city to rescue as many civilians as you can before you run out of time.

Use W and S to speed Up/Down, and A/D to turn Left/Right. Press the Escape key to open the pause menu.

To play this game, simply install the Zipped file below. Once downloaded, unzip the folder and run  the Project_Hard_Boiled Executable Application inside.
